text: 21.5 Ais 62.11, Sek 9.9, Jon 12.15 Taun Sayon21.5 Taun kɨli Jelusalem ak, yɨb olap Sayon agelɨgɨpal. binɨb okok kɨlop takaw anɨb ak agɨnɨmɨb, Nɨgɨm, bɨnonɨm nɨbi ak chag donki adek besɨgɨl nɨbop yɨl apeb agɨnɨmɨb agɨl tɨkak. Ne bɨ sayn tep yɨbɨl olap, chag donki ñɨluk adek ak besɨgɨl apeb agɨnɨmɨb agɨl tɨkak.
